name_validation: Name must be at least 3 letters long and can only contain letters and spaces.
lastname_validation: Last name must be at least 3 letters long and can only contain letters and spaces.
id_validation: ID must be at least 6 digits long and can only contain numbers.
location_validation: Location must be at least 3 characters long and can contain letters, numbers, spaces, commas and periods.
username_validation: Username must be at least 3 characters long and can only contain letters, numbers, underscores (_) and hyphens (-).
password_validation: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
phone_validation: Phone number must be at least 10 digits long and can only contain numbers.
email_validation: Please enter a valid email address.
